name: God of Slime
description:
Slime, the weakest creature in the world. But is it? What will happen if she becomes sane. It is you who will have to find out, at the same time remembering your past life, and developing your abilities to the limit.

The author is inspired by such projects as God of War, Hollow Knight, Vamero: Dream cristal, and an anime about my reincarnation into a slime.

this is not my only project, so its life is completely up to you, since I developed it for a five day game jam.

If you support this game, then I will gladly continue development on this interesting pixel project.
